title: Modified Sleep Apnea Machines May Ease the Ventilator Crunch
description: Preparing for surges of Covid   patients  health care workers are turning to retrofitted versions of devices that are plentiful and approved for use
content: As hospital administrators and public health officials scramble to meet a shortage of ventilators for Covid   patients  teams of doctors  engineers  and DIYers are filling some gaps by modifying breathing machines that are relatively plentiful  such as those    chars
